name: How to Die Like a Graceful Beast
name_original: How to Die Like a Graceful Beast
description:
Note: I've added an HTML5 version so that more people can play it. It should hopefully run okay on most screens, but may not be ideal on older monitors. Also, it is highly recommended that you press the full screen button (on the bottom right of the game window) before you play the game. If you have a Windows PC, I recommend you download the executable, as it should automatically scale to your resolution, as intended.

How to Die Like a Graceful Beast is meant to be something of a digital secret box. I've been calling it an interactive super-poem, because that makes sense to me. But you don't have to. It is a bit opaque and a bit dark. It is quiet, meditative, I guess. It requires quite a bit of reading. It is a thing that I made.
